name: collections::btree::split::<impl collections::btree::node::NodeRef<collections::btree::node::marker::Owned, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::LeafOrInternal>>::new_pillar

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<coll.doc: Returns a new owned tree, with its own root node that is initially empty.

Adds a new internal node with a single edge pointing to the previous root node,
 make that new node the root node, and return it. This increases the height by 1
 and is the opposite of `pop_internal_level`.

doc: Creates a tree consisting of empty nodes.
